title: Dealing with difficult people
brief_description: The aim of this video-based training program is to inform participants about four fundamental techniques which will enable them to deal with difficult people. The techniques can be applied to everyday contexts within the home and workplace. A video which complements the manual can be borrowed as a separate loan item.
